thread.title: Lisa

author: Lisa
title: Lisa
text: My daughter needed a formal. She is extremely picky and a plus size girl to boot. We put in her measurements and ordered a dress everyone agreed upon according to the size they determined by her measurements. Within three days we had the dress in hand. She put it on and it is a moment that melts a mom's heart. It is a little long and needs to be hem (she's 5'4") and the shoulders adjusted just a minor bit but otherwise the dress was perfect!
